005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter;
007
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsonFormatVisitors.JsonFormatTypes;
009
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.AbstractDataTypeAdapter;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IIPv4AddressItem;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
014
015import java.util.List;
016
017import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
018
019import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
020import inet.ipaddr.AddressStringException;
021import inet.ipaddr.IPAddressString;
022import inet.ipaddr.IPAddressStringParameters;
023import inet.ipaddr.IncompatibleAddressException;
024import inet.ipaddr.ipv4.IPv4Address;
025
026public class IPv4AddressAdapter
027    extends AbstractDataTypeAdapter<IPv4Address, IIPv4AddressItem> {
028  @NonNull
029  private static final List<QName> NAMES = ObjectUtils.notNull(
030      List.of(new QName(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH.toASCIIString(), "ip-v4-address")));
031  private static final IPAddressStringParameters IP_V_4;
032
033  static {
034    IP_V_4 = new IPAddressStringParameters.Builder()
035        .allowIPv6(false)
036        .allowEmpty(false)
037        .allowSingleSegment(false)
038        .allowWildcardedSeparator(false)
039        .getIPv4AddressParametersBuilder()
040        .allowBinary(false)
041        .allowLeadingZeros(false)
042        .allowPrefixesBeyondAddressSize(false)
043        .getParentBuilder()
044        .toParams();
045  }
046
047  IPv4AddressAdapter() {
048    super(IPv4Address.class);
049  }
050
051  @Override
052  public List<QName> getNames() {
053    return NAMES;
054  }
055
056  @Override
057  public JsonFormatTypes getJsonRawType() {
058    return JsonFormatTypes.STRING;
059  }
060
061  @SuppressWarnings("null")
062  @Override
063  public IPv4Address parse(String value) {
064    try {
065      return (IPv4Address) new IPAddressString(value, IP_V_4).toAddress();
066    } catch (AddressStringException | IncompatibleAddressException ex) {
067      throw new IllegalArgumentException(ex.getLocalizedMessage(), ex);
068    }
069  }
070
071  @Override
072  public IPv4Address copy(Object obj) {
073    // value is immutable
074    return (IPv4Address) obj;
075  }
076
077  @Override
078  public Class<IIPv4AddressItem> getItemClass() {
079    return IIPv4AddressItem.class;
080  }
081
082  @Override
083  public IIPv4AddressItem newItem(Object value) {
084    IPv4Address item = toValue(value);
085    return IIPv4AddressItem.valueOf(item);
086  }
087}
